description:
Neithardt MÃ¼ller was an Imperial Admiral who served under http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm]. As the person who had the most interaction with http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]`s republican faction outside warfare, he was often appointed as Reinhard`s envoy when dealing with them.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Neithardt Muller
